entry.et: French réaliser, from Middle French realiser, from real real

def.dt: :to bring into concrete existence :accomplish finally realized her goal
:to cause to seem real :make appear real a book in which the characters are carefully realized
:to convert into actual money realized assets
:to bring or get by sale, investment, or effort :gain realized a large profit
:to conceive vividly as real :be fully aware of did not realize the risk she was taking
